item.description:
Come and join us for a favorite Boston summer tradition -- Free Friday Flicks at the Hatch Shell!

Please bring a blanket to sit and some snacks to munch on! The movie starts at dusk.

Copyright regulations prevent the title of the move from being printed, but here is a hint:

"Join a big green orge and his friends once again, as they travel from Far Far Away and fight to be the heir of the land"

In case of rain, please call 617-787-7200 for cancellation information.

Directions:

Take Red Line to Charles (Street)/MGH station or the Green line to Arlington station. Walk down Arlington St. toward Beacon St. & cross Beacon St. You will see the big Arthur Fiedler Walkway in front of you. Walk across the walkway and the Hatch Shell is on your right.

The official Free Friday Flicks website is:
http://wbz.com/Free-F...
item.how_to_find_us: Pauline will wear an orange shirt.
item.name: Movie Night
